channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel Isn’t a Danger to Jews — Jew Haters Are
item.description: The idea that Israel’s actions are putting Jews at risk globally is a contemptible position that would never be applied to any other minority group.

item.title: Here’s A Pile Of Evidence Lockdowns Would Never Have Happened Without Corporate Media
item.description: Our government and media coordinated to lie to us about reality and thereby light millions of lives on fire.

item.title: Texas' Republican-controlled House approves new maps to create more winnable GOP congressional seats
item.description: Texas Republicans on Wednesday took the first step toward approving new congressional maps that would give their party as many as five new seats in th...

item.title: Stop Tolerating The Toxic Ideas Of Black Radicals
item.description: The left has mainstreamed utterly bizarre racist ideas about white people from hate groups such as the Nation of Islam, and they expect to be taken se...

item.title: How the U.S. Can Make the Most of a Defense-Spending Boom
item.description: The choice is clear: modernize and lead — or remain the arsenal of bureaucracy.

item.title: Border Security Is More Humane Than Giving Migrant Kids To Strangers Like Biden Did
item.description: The Biden administration’s policies ripened conditions for criminal trafficking and created a pedophile paradise.

item.title: Cracker Barrel Settles On The Ugliest, Most Soulless Logo You Can Imagine To Destroy Its Brand
item.description: Cracker Barrel seems determined to destroy its iconic brand with its new logo change.

item.title: As A Former DC Cop, I Can Tell You The Federal Takeover Was The Right Move
item.description: I have arrived at countless D.C. crime scenes. The victim on the ground, grotesquely contorted, calling to me in their final moments.

item.title: The Government Shouldn’t Get into the Chip Business
item.description: It would be a bad idea for the Trump administration to take a stake in Intel.

item.title: ‘Choice’ Cannot Coexist with Abortion Coercion
item.description: The abortion industry has enabled coercion and abuse and is willing to sacrifice women’s ‘choice’ on the altar of abortion access and increased profit...

item.title: Walmart sales outlook improves despite new tariff costs
item.description: Walmart raised its sales outlook for the year on Thursday, even though its tariff-related costs are rising.

item.title: Who Knew Sheboygan Is an Art Mecca?
item.description: Wisconsin’s Kohler Arts Center does ingenuity with both sparkle and substance.

item.title: Federal Reserve Chairman Powell eyes long-awaited rate cut in September

item.title: Court allows Trump to end deportation amnesty for Honduras, Nicaragua, Nepal
item.description: A federal appeals court said Wednesday that Homeland Security can move ahead with plans to end long-running deportation amnesties, known as Temporary ...

item.title: Judge denies Justice Department request for Epstein grand jury transcripts
